name: BoomToTheTop - SpaceScoreJam#9
description:
***The online leaderboard service doesn't work with the HTML5 build, download the windows executable if you want to submint your score***

Try to reach the highest point you can by exploding with some TNT!
Hold spacebar to slow down and aim your target.

Gameplay video

> You need to type your name before starting the game
> If you can't type your name with the HTML5 build, try reload the page
> If you Quick Reset you'll not be able to submit your score (winows only)
> Press P or ESC if you want to end the game and submit your score (windows only)

Inputs:

- Start game: Spacebar
- Move: A and D
- Slowmotion: Hold Spacebar
- Quick restart: R
- End run: P or ESC

External resources:

- Leaderboard by http://epicleaderboard.com
- Explosion sounds from freesound.org ( JustInvoke | eardeer| Bykgames)
- Music from UE4 Marketplace MuzStation Game Music
- Explosion tilesheet from itch.io https://ansimuz.itch.io/explosion-animations-pack
